Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class Texture

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Texture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Const, ConstTexture
public class Texture extends SFMLNativeObject implements ConstTexture
Represents a 2D texture stored on the graphics card for rendering.

    Enumeation of texture coordinate types that can be used for rendering.

  • Method Details

    • getMaximumSize

      public static int getMaximumSize()
      Gets the maximum texture size supported by the current hardware.
      Returns:
      the maximum texture size supported by the current hardware.

    • bind

      public static void bind(ConstTexture texture, Texture.CoordinateType coordinateType)
      Activates a texture for rendering with the specified coordinate type.

      This is required only if you wish to use JSFML textures in custom OpenGL code.

      Parameters:
      texture - the texture to bind, or null to indicate that no texture is to be used..
      coordinateType - the coordinate type to use.

    • bind

      public static void bind(ConstTexture texture)
      Activates a texture for rendering, using the Texture.CoordinateType.NORMALIZED coordinate type.

    • create

      public void create(int width, int height) throws TextureCreationException
      Generates an empty texture with the specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      width - the texture's width.
      height - the texture's height.
      Throws:
      TextureCreationException - if the texture could not be created.

      public void loadFromStream(InputStream in, IntRect area) throws IOException
      Fully loads all available bytes from an InputStream and attempts to load the texture portion from it.
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream to read from.
      area - the area of the image to load into the texture.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.

    • setSmooth

      public void setSmooth(boolean smooth)
      Enables or disables the smooth filter.

      The smooth filter is disabled by default.

      Parameters:
      smooth - true to enable, false to disable.

      public void setRepeated(boolean repeated)
      Enables or disables texture repeating.

      Texture repeating is disabled by default.

    • update

      public void update(Image image, int x, int y)
      Updates a part of the texture from an image.
      Parameters:

      x - the X offset inside the texture.
      y - the Y offset inside the texture.
